After Sales+Customer Education+Usage Tip.EXPLANATION: Measure of how effective usage tips are in helping users understand and utilize products, based on feedback and engagement metrics.
After Sales+Customer Education+Usage Tip.FORMULA: Average Rating of the Effectiveness of Usage Tips from User Feedback

After Sales+Customer Education+Usage Tip.KPIS: Usage tips adoption rate among users.
After Sales+Customer Education+Usage Tip.EXPLANATION: Percentage of users who engage with and utilize provided usage tips compared to the total number of users, indicating the appeal and effectiveness of the tips.
After Sales+Customer Education+Usage Tip.FORMULA: (Number of Users Who Adopt Usage Tips / Total Number of Users) * 100

After Sales+Customer Education+Usage Tip.KPIS: Cost savings from usage tips implementation.
After Sales+Customer Education+Usage Tip.EXPLANATION: Financial savings achieved from implementing effective usage tips, calculated as reduced costs due to improved product usage and fewer support requests.
After Sales+Customer Education+Usage Tip.FORMULA: (Estimated Savings from Usage Tips - Cost of Implementing Usage Tips) / Cost of Implementing Usage Tips * 100

After Sales+Customer Education+Usage Tip.KPIS: Usage tips compliance with safety guidelines.
After Sales+Customer Education+Usage Tip.EXPLANATION: Degree to which usage tips adhere to safety guidelines and best practices, measured through reviews and safety compliance checks.
After Sales+Customer Education+Usage Tip.FORMULA: (Number of Compliant Usage Tips / Total Number of Usage Tips) * 100

After Sales+Customer Education+Usage Tip.KPIS: User satisfaction with usage tips relevance.
After Sales+Customer Education+Usage Tip.EXPLANATION: Measure of how satisfied users are with the relevance and usefulness of the provided usage tips, gathered through surveys and feedback.
After Sales+Customer Education+Usage Tip.FORMULA: Average User Satisfaction Score for the Relevance of Usage Tips

After Sales+Customer Education+Usage Tip.EXPLANATION: Rate at which usage tips are updated to reflect new information, changes, or user feedback, indicating the currency of the tips.
After Sales+Customer Education+Usage Tip.FORMULA: Number of Updates to Usage Tips / Number of Months

After Sales+Customer Education+Usage Tip.KPIS: Usage tips engagement metrics (e.g., views, shares).
After Sales+Customer Education+Usage Tip.EXPLANATION: Measure of user engagement with usage tips, including metrics like views, shares, and interactions.
After Sales+Customer Education+Usage Tip.FORMULA: (Number of Views + Shares) / Number of Usage Tips

After Sales+Customer Education+Usage Tip.KPIS: Usage tips impact on product longevity.
After Sales+Customer Education+Usage Tip.EXPLANATION: Measure of how usage tips contribute to the longevity and durability of products, based on product performance and feedback.
After Sales+Customer Education+Usage Tip.FORMULA: (Increase in Product Longevity Due to Usage Tips / Initial Product Longevity) * 100
